name: CreateSubtaskForTask
description:
Create a new subtask under a specified parent task.

This tool is used to create a new subtask and associate it with an existing parent task in Asana. It requires the 'tasks:write' scope and returns the complete record of the newly created subtask.

parameters.name: parent_task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the parent task for which the new subtask will be created.

parameters.name: new_subtask_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the new subtask to create.

parameters.name: included_optional_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response. Allows access to optional fields not included by default.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for a formatted JSON response with line breaks and indentation. Increases size and time; use for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
